title: WTTF or BUY t206 name at tops
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: WTTF or BUY t206 name at tops
posts.post_content: I have 6 to trade or i will buy any you want to sell.  Just ask that at least  3/4's of the top name be there.  Paying $50 to $200.  Please send scans to [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks Rob.  Dolly is very happy in his new home.
I know of 3 in the last month that have sold for under $30.  I'll give anywhere from $50 to $200 for one.  Don't sell yours for a major loss.  [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
1/5 of the way there.  Any help out there?
Good luck on your quest! I love it:)
I've added two more. Burns and McCormick are very nice.
Sorry to keep bumping this but yet another member left money on the table this week selling his name at top(to someone else).
